column3: Feel free to let me know if you don't want to expand on the scope of this PR @fanquake, but I'd like to document our overall approach to constructing the OSX toolchain, especially picking versions of tools. I don't think it's written down anywhere in the codebase yet.

@dongcarl I'm going to merge this as-is. We can follow up with some more extensive macOS toolchain docs (although we should probably write some more general docs), either in a separate PR or as part of #17920 ðŸ¤”.
